Wolemekezeka Yehova thanthwe langa,wakuphunzitsa manja anga achite nkhondo,zala zanga zigwirane nao:
Ndiye chifundo changa, ndi linga langa,msanje wanga, ndi Mpulumutsi wanga;chikopa changa, ndi Iye amene ndimtama;amene andigonjetsera anthu anga.
Yehova, munthu ndani kuti mumdziwa?Mwana wa munthu kuti mumsamalira?
Munthu akunga mpweya;masiku ake akunga mthunzi wopitirira.
Weramutsani thambo lanu, Yehova, nimutsike:Khudzani mapiri ndipo adzafuka.
Ng'animitsani mphezi, ndi kuwabalalitsa;tumizani mivi yanu, ndi kuwapirikitsa.
Tulutsani manja anu kuchokera m'mwamba;ndikwatuleni ndi kundilanditsa kumadzi aakulu,kudzanja la alendo;
amene pakamwa pao alankhula zachabe,ndi dzanja lao lamanja ndilo dzanja lachinyengo.
Ndidzakuimbirani nyimbo yatsopano, Mulungu;pa chisakasa cha zingwe khumi ndidzaimbira zakukulemekezani.
Ndiye amene apatsa mafumu chipulumutso:Amene alanditsa Davide mtumiki wake kulupanga loipa.
Ndilanditseni ndi kundipulumutsa kudzanja la alendo,amene pakamwa pao alankhula zachabe,ndi dzanja lao lamanja ndilo dzanja lachinyengo.
Kuti ana athu amuna akhale ngati mmera udakula usanakhwime;ana athu akazi ngati nsanamira za kungodya,zosema zikometsere nyumba ya mfumu.
Kuti nkhokwe zathu zidzale, kutipatsa za mitundumitundu;ndi kuti nkhosa zathu ziswane zikwizikwi, inde zikwi khumi kubusako.
Kuti ng'ombe zathu zikhale zosenza katundu;ndi kuti pasakhale kupasula linga kapena kutulukamo,pasakhalenso kufuula m'makwalala athu.
Odala anthu akuona zotere;odala anthu amene Mulungu wao ndi Yehova.
